I had a moment of clarity today while training kerbals.

Kerbals are gerbils, and orbits are hamster wheels.

The existential implications. o.O

Kerbals are gerbils, and orbits are hamster wheels.

The existential implications. o.O

It's a carefully executed plan made by the Kerbolluminatti allied with the New Kerbin Order....

It's a carefully executed plan made by the Kerbolluminatti allied with the New Kerbin Order....

and it all started at the grassy knoll...

and it all started at the grassy knoll...

KfK was the Kresident of the Kunited Kates, and he was Kassasinated on the Krassy Knoll, but Kee Karvy Koswald was accused.
